item.title: Lets Create A Domain-Specific Language for Molecular Interaction Analysis!
item.description: What is a Domain-Specific Language? It is more common than you think. Few of us – computational chemists – have heard the term Domain-Specific Language (DSL for short), even though this is somewhat ubiquitous in our workflow, especially when dealing with molecule visualisation. Don’t you believe me? Check out the command you type on VMD, PyMOL, YASARA, or Chimera.
